text: Both the powered exoskeleton and the group of mechanical ants had been no match for Murasaki-sensei.
We had managed to escape the base in one piece and returned to the informant brokerーto the Masked Madam.

name: Murasaki
text: My presence would only complicate the conversation. I'll be waiting outside, so contact me if something happens.

name: Me
text: Understood.

name: Shikanosuke
text: A-Alright, let's go!

name: Hebiko
text: Having completed her request properly, now Heberybody can go in confidently!

name: Man in Black
text: Welcome back. Madam is expecting you, please follow me to the office.
As we entered Club Persona, the black-suited men led us in as if he had been waiting for us.
We stood out like a sore thumb, and a murmur went through the crowd as they noticed us.

name: Me
text: (Heheh, this feels kinda nice...)

name: Madam
text: Looks like you went on quite the rampage.

name: Me
text: Yeah, thanks to a certain somebody telling us it was a "gang hideout." We ran into quite a bit of trouble because of that.

name: Madam
text: You poor things. So, did you get it?

name: Me
text: Of course. But before that... what's going on here?
A man in a white lab coat stood in the office with an indignant look. This was definitely the Kiryu Sabato I had read about in the documents.

name: Me
text: I thought you said you were going to tell me where he was hiding?

name: Madam
text: There was a "slight" discrepancy in the information I gave you, so this is a little something extra for you.

name: Me
text: A "slight" discrepancy, huh... but I will gratefully accept it.
At least that saved us the trouble. I placed the portable high-capacity storage deviceーone of the twoーwith the downloaded data on the coffee table.

name: Madam
text: Hmhmm, good.
Madam just gave it one quick glance without confirming the contents, and then gave Kiryu a push.

name: Kiryu
text: Hey, wait a second!? When did I say I'd be going back!?
Kiryu, who had been quiet so far, finally opened his mouth.

name: Madam
text: You promised, didn't you? That you'd return quietly if I got you all those disgusting aphrodisiacs and love potions that you wanted.

name: Kiryu
text: Yes, I promised! But only if Murasaki came to pick me up!

name: Madam
text: These three are here as representatives of Murasaki, isn't that the same thing?

name: Kiryu
text: Nooooo, it's not! It's totally different!!! Murasaki herself must come here and apologize to me, there's no other way!!!

name: Kiryu
text: She questioned my love!!! That's a serious betrayal!!!
What the hell. This was the skilled demonologist who had worked with Nomad, who was supposed to be contaminated by evil and rotten to the core or something like that?

name: Me
text: (His love for Murasaki-sensei...?)
This looked like it was going to become a total pain to deal with.
I glanced at Madam and was able to tell, in spite of her mask, that she was making an exasperated face as well.

name: Me
text: What's wrong with this guy...?

name: Madam
text: He's like a spoiled brat... And he's infatuated with Murasaki.

name: Me
text: So he's sulking because she won't return his love?

name: Madam
text: No, it's more like keeping track of the times he got rejected and what she said each time is a hobby for him or something.

name: Me
text: A pervert and an absolute pain to deal with...

name: Madam
text: In any case, this makes it difficult. I can't return him to you like this...

name: Me
text: (Hm? Wait a second...)

name: Murasaki
text: In case you have ever trouble dealing with him, use this.
I took out the envelope from Murasaki-sensei that I had kept in my pocket.

name: Me
text: A-Actually, I was prepared for this very scenario. Kiryu-san, this is from Murasaki-sensei.
I handed over the mysterious envelope, which I was warned not to open or "she would kill me," to Kiryu.

name: Kiryu
text: From Murasaki for me!? What is it?? To think she'd try to lure me with something...
*Rip.*
Kiryu opened the envelope and slowly checked its contentsー

name: Kiryu
text: Oohyohhaaah!!?

name: Kiryu
text: Th-This is for me!!? S-So she was madly in love with me after all!!! Since she's given me this treasure!!!
He was suddenly dancing with joy.
After jumping, skipping, and spinning through the cramped office, he started walking towards the exit in big strides.

name: Kiryu
text: I'm returning! I'm going back!! We're getting married!! My love might have even convinced her she's already pregnant!!! WAHAHAHAHA!!!
What the hell had been in that envelope?
I was extremely curious, but at least it looked like we'd be able to bring Kiryu Sabato back with us... or more like he had already gone back on his own.

name: Me
text: Madam, I have one last question.

name: Madam
text: What is it? You did a good job, so if it's something simple, I'll even tell you for free♪

name: Me
text: How were you able to get your hands on something like a UFS access code?

name: Madam
text: That's a secret.

name: Me
text: And you most likely also knew that the Taimanin... that Yatsu Murasaki was going to attack the UFS base, didn't you?

name: Me
text: Which is why you figured that even rookies like us would be able to get our hands on the data. That means we were completely played by you.

name: Madam
text: Are you complaining?

name: Me
text: No, we got played by you simply because we were too unexperienced. I have no hard feelings toward you.

name: Madam
text: What an admirable attitude.

name: Me
text: We also got help from this scrap metal girl.
Who are you calling scrap metal?!
Suddenly, a voice came out of nowhere. It was definitely the voice of this Asuka, who had helped us in the underground UFS base.
So far Madam had been answering nonchalantly, but now she put her hand to her forehead as if to say "Sheesh."

name: Me
text: So she is one of your underlings after all.

name: Me
text: That's not something from the Devildom, no matter how you look at it. Android limbs are nearly impossible to maintain without special assistance.

name: Me
text: And there's only one country that can maintain state-of-the-art technology like that...

name: Me
text: But if that's the case, then why would you make us infiltrate a secret UFS base?

name: Madam
text: Better stop asking now. Or do you have a death wish?
Instantly a deadly aura came from the Masked Madam.

name: Me
text: (Damn it, did I say too much...?)
Just when I felt that I might be in danger, the office window shatteredー
And Murasaki-sensei jumped in and chopped the Masked Madam in half with a single stroke.

name: Me
text: Murasaki-sensei!

name: Murasaki
text: Shikanosuke contacted me. He said that you were about to be killed.

name: Me
text: I see, sometimes him being a wuss is quite helpful.
Howeverーthe body of the chopped-in-half Madam turned into a destroyed sofa.

name: Madam
text: Sorry for underestimating you. You seem like a capable boy♪

name: Madam
text: Thank you for the data. Let's meet again somewhere...

name: Me
text: Madam...!!
She left behind her alluring voice, and any traces of Madam evaporated into the night air.

name: Murasaki
text: Decoy Jutsu... that masked woman is a Taimanin.

name: Me
text: A Taimanin...
That meant just like the rebellious Gaiza, there were other Taimanin acting without government affiliation.
And they even had state-of-the-art technology to give people android body parts.

name: Me
text: (She's definitely being supported by the UFS...)

name: Me
text: (Why did somebody like that make us raid a secret UFS base and steal data?)

name: Me
text: (There are still some missing pieces.)
Without enough information, I couldn't come up with an answer no matter how much I racked my brain.

name: Me
text: (A Taimanin working with the UFS, and a Taimanin working with Nomad... Gaiza, where are you now, and what are you doing...?)
Several days later. Still before dawn, a figure was passing through the streets of a mountain village.
The figure was a man. He was making his way along the road at a quick pace, almost as if trying to beat the morning sun that slowly started to illuminate the mountain.
The man entered the largest house in the village and stopped.
As he did, countless shadows emerged from the darkness, and attacked him like wild foxes.
Without even a sound, it all happened in an instant. The shadows were cut to pieces by the man, and stillness fell over the scene again.
The man was Nisha Gaiza.

name: Nisha Gaiza
text: How is my honorable mother?

name: Elderly Woman
text: She's not feeling well today... M-Maybe you should refrain from...
The elderly woman, who seemed to be the housekeeper, stepped out to meet Gaiza and timidly chided him.

name: Gaiza
text: I see... Only for a moment, gran.
Gaiza gestured to the woman to stay put and made his way to the bedroom by himself.

name: Gaiza
text: Honorable Mother...
In the bedroom, a woman was sitting on the bed.
She must have been in her 30s, no, in her 40s.
She looked pale and sickly in the the faint light, and she stared into the empty air with no emotion in her eyes.
She looked as though she might disappear if touched, like the moon reflected in the water's surface, so Gaiza hesitated for a moment before speaking.
But then he lifted his head and clearly called out to her.

name: Gaiza
text: Honorable Mother.
Upon hearing the voice, the woman slowly tilted her head to the side and looked at Gaiza.
And then her expression, which had been as blank as a mask only moments ago, suddenly cleared up and became full of life force.

name: Woman
text: Ahh! Danjo-sama!!! What brings you a place like this... Ahhh, and when I'm in such a state!
The woman combed her messy hair with her fingers, straightened the collar of her clothes, and leaned closer to Gaiza.

name: Gaiza
text: Honorable Mother... it's me... it's Gaiza...

name: Woman
text: Gaiza!!! Gaiza, where are you!? Danjo-sama has...! Your father has returned!!!
Gaiza looked anguished and held his mother back as she tried to jump up from the bed.

name: Gaiza
text: Honorable Mother, Danjo-sama is dead! He was killed!!

name: Woman
text: Yes, kill him, Gaiza! Kill that useless heir!

name: Woman
text: You will succeed Fuma Kotaro! That's what everyone wants!
The woman shouted, now with a demon-like look on her face.
Hearing the commotion, the elderly housekeeper rushed into the room with some medicine.

name: Elderly Woman
text: Everything is alright, Mistress... It is time for your medicine.

name: Woman
text: Yes, medicine... Danjo-sama... Danjo-sa... ma...
The elderly housekeeper had the woman take the medicine while soothing her as though she had done so many times, and the woman quickly fell asleep.
Gaiza had reached for one of his kunai, but quietly put it back in his pocket.

name: Gaiza
text: Please... take care of my honorable mother.
Gaiza slumped his shoulders and returned to the streets of the mountain village that had slowly started to brighten up.
